function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reduced social interaction due to social distancing measures in shopping environments.","Impact":"Negative effects on consumers' wellbeing, including increased anxiety, stress, and depression.","Mitigation":"Implement technology solutions to enable virtual social interactions and personalized shopping experiences.","Technologies":"Virtual reality, augmented reality, personalized recommendation algorithms.","People":"Consumers","Owner":"Retailers, technology companies"},{"Description":"Limited opportunity for enjoyable shopping experiences due to restrictions and fears related to the pandemic.","Impact":"Decreased satisfaction and pleasure in shopping, leading to a shift from fun-shopping to quick, functional shopping.","Mitigation":"Develop and implement technology solutions to enhance virtual shopping experiences and provide convenience.","Technologies":"Virtual browsing, online try-on tools, rapid checkout systems.","People":"Consumers","Owner":"Retailers, technology companies"}]}
